name: Trip to Paris

categories.name: Food
categories.description: Restaurants, cafes, and markets to visit.

categories.name: Attractions
categories.description: Museums, monuments, and other tourist spots.

categories.name: Shopping
categories.description: Boutiques, department stores, and flea markets.

categories.name: Nature
categories.description: Parks, gardens, and other green spaces to explore.

items.name: Eiffel Tower
items.notes: Visit the observation deck for stunning city views.

items.name: Louvre Museum
items.notes: See the Mona Lisa and other masterpieces.

items.name: Notre Dame Cathedral
items.notes: Admire the Gothic architecture and stained glass windows.

items.name: Macarons
items.notes: Try different flavors from Ladurée or Pierre Hermé.

items.name: Souvenirs
items.notes: Buy Eiffel Tower keychains, postcards, and other mementos.

items.name: River Seine Cruise
items.notes: Enjoy a romantic evening cruise along the Seine.

items.name: Montmartre Art Museum
items.notes: Visit the museum to see works by famous artists like Monet and Renoir.

notes: Pack comfortable shoes for all the walking you'll be doing!
